p: The inhibitory effects on human carboxylesterases (hCE1, hCE2) of compound 386 were evaluated. The results demonstrated that bysspectin A 386 was a novel and highly selective inhibitor against hCE2 with the IC 50 value of 2.01 ÂµM. Docking simulation also demonstrated that active compound 386 created interaction with the Ser-288 (the catalytic amino-acid in the catalytic cavity) of hCE2 via hydrogen bonding, revealing its highly selective inhibition toward hCE2 [ 124].
